resource.chars:
At page 44. John Hunter’s 
<s>infer <\s> assertion that muscle 
shrinks in contracting is
cited & it is stated that 
“there are no subsequent investigations 
of sufficient weight to set 
aside the evidence”
Dr. Radcliffe has forgotten 
the Researches of Prevost & Dumas 
of Valentin, of Matteucci, of 
Ermann, of Marchand &
of Weber - investigations 
made with the utmost care 
& which demonstrate 
that the diminution 
of volume in contraction 
is wholly unimportant
